thread.title: Remo D'Souza hurts himself on 'Dance +' set
thread.title_full: Remo D'Souza hurts himself on 'Dance +' set - Entertainment

author: IANS
title: Remo D'Souza hurts himself on 'Dance +' set
text:
Choreographer Remo D'Souza, who is the 'superjudge' in the dance reality show 'Dance +', hurt himself on the sets while rehearsing for a solo performance for the finale on Sunday.

Remo D'Souza 
Remo was rehearsing for the solo bit of his performance with dancers Dharmesh and Dharmendra. He was trying to do a flip when he lost balance and fell on his back and was injured. But he returned for the final shoot.
"It was just a little imbalance but such things happen. The finale is today and the show must go on," Remo said in a statement.
Despite the pain, he continued shooting but broke off at 8 a.m. Yet, he returned to the set to complete the shoot at 10 a.m.
'Dance +' also features 'captains' Shakti Mohan, Dharmesh Yelande and Sumeet Nagdev.
The finale will be beamed on Sunday on Star Plus.
